short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: changing password field to text, to see your password

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
simply this extension change the type="password" to type="text" in the HTML code,

users most of the time when they want to see their password they have two choices

 1- Use inspect and change it manually (5 clicks and 4 keystrokes)
2- Go to browser settings. (5 clicks and 1 keystroke)

with this extension, the above procedure will take 1 click, and saves 10 seconds in your life.
